newsitem.title: USA: HFS to pay $625 mln for Resort Condominiums.
newsitem.headline: HFS to pay $625 mln for Resort Condominiums.

text.p: HFS Inc said Monday it has definitive agreements to buy Resort Condominiums International Inc, a privately-held, Indiana company, for about $625 million plus future contingent payments of up to $200 million over the next five years.
HFS said $75 million of the purchase price will be in HFS common stock and the remainder will be cash. Closing is expected by year-end, the company said.
HFS has over 5,300 franchised hotels in the U.S., Canada, Latin America and Europe and about 11,200 franchised real estate offices that include CENTURY 21 and Coldwell Banker.
